title: Enhancing Nursing Practice Competency: Blended Learning for Strengthening Evidence-Based Medical Decision-Making Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of medical research methodologies and basic statistical concepts
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can critically evaluate medical research papers to determine the reliability level of evidence
Learners will be able to systematically explain the process of applying evidence-based decision-making in clinical scenarios.
Learners will be able to propose solutions for real-world medical cases by utilizing a problem-based learning (PBL) approach.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
